lyric: 作词 : TetraCalyx
作曲 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX）
编曲 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX）
制作人 : 文驰Vinchi(HOYO-MiX）
Carved on stones
Buried deep in the earth
Long submerged beneath waterfalls
Triggering a thunderstorm
Summoning gusts of wind
seething waves of sea, slapping on the reefs
to make a Voice
Tell us what to believe, without any doubt
Without any doubt never let us down
Tell us when to depart for a promise true
translation: 告诉我们赴约出发的时机

lyric: For a promise true despite the day of doom
A bloodline stretches out one more inch with every heartbeat
translation: 一条血脉随着每一次心跳延伸

lyric: reaches a fingertip that has been staying at the words on the page
translation: 直至到达长久停留于那些文字的指尖

lyric: We have grown up before taking heart of grace
translation: 我们在鼓起勇气之前已经成长

lyric: Taking heart of grace is how we blaze a way
We still struggle against the fear of being unarmed
translation: 我们克服着手无寸铁的恐惧

lyric: The fear of being unarmed keeps our frailty apart
translation: 而终将成为更坚强的自己

lyric: No one would be able to look down upon this world
translation: 没人可以俯瞰这个世界

lyric: So one is allowed to be born
We've known what to believe, without any doubt
Without any doubt never let us down
We have taken the road for a promise true
For a promise true despite the day of doom
录音 Recording Engineer : 徐威@52HzStudio
混音 Mixing Engineer : 文驰Vinchi
母带 Mastering Engineer: 李敬浩Hao
出品 Produced by:HOYO-MiX
